snippet.title: Lanes closed on Pacific Motorway after crash
snippet.content: Commuters have been warned to expect delays after lanes were closed on the Pacific Motorway northbound following a crash. A Queensland Ambulance Service spokeswoman said paramedics witnessed the crash, about 7.30am near the Kessels Road on ramp at Macgregor.Photo: Jorge Branco According to the government-run QLD Traffic website, the right and left lanes were blocked as crews worked to clean oil from the road. Paramedics did not treat any patients. A Queensland Fire and Emergency Services spokeswoman said two crews were on scene. She said there was a second crash southbound in the same area. PACIFIC Mwy NB crash right lane & left lanes blocked. Crews cleaning oil from road. Towing on scene removing car. Heavy delays.
